\n
\nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Organic Tart Cherry Concentrate 32 fl. oz.
Short description:
Organic Tart Cherry Concentrate 32 fl. oz.
\n
\nTart cherries are known by several names, including dwarf cherries or sour cherries, but don’t start puckering just yet—they’ve got a sweet kick to them, too, making for the perfect flavor balance. But that’s just the surface level of what makes this concentrate great. Inside each bottle you’ll find vitamins A, C and K, along with minerals and nutrients such as copper, manganese and potassium. And if you need to chill out, tart cherries can help you dial it down a notch thanks to naturally-occurring melatonin, and the compounds tryptophan and anthocyanins, which encourage your body to create melatonin. Tart cherries also offer five times the antioxidants of sweet cherries, but our concentrate takes that antioxidant profile even further by packing the antioxidant power of 1000* tart cherries in each 32-oz bottle. That’s a lot of goodness loaded into one concentrate! Traditionally used for relief from inflammation and gout.
\n
\nUntainted by sweeteners, preservatives, and other additives, Dynamic Health Certified Organic Tart Cherry Juice is nothing more than pure, natural power and nutrition. Extracted from sun-ripened montmorency and balaton tart cherries, our 100% juice concentrate contains the antioxidant power of 1000* tart cherries in each 32-oz bottle along with naturally occurring nutrients.
\n
\nPerfectly tasty on its own or mixed with seltzer, smoothies, sauces, dressings, and vinaigrettes, it's easy to take a serving each day. And because our Tart Cherry Juice Concentrate is certified organic, gluten free, vegan, BPA free, Halal, and Kosher, there's no reason not to!
\n
\nTrust one of nature's most powerful elixirs to deliver extraordinary taste and nutrition.
\n
\n100% Tart Cherry Concentrate - Nothing else added! No added sugar. Kosher.
\n
\nServing Size: 2 tablespoons (30mL) of Organic Tart Cherry Concentrate. May be mixed with water, seltzer, juice or a beverage of your choice. Take with at least 250mL (8oz) of liquid.
\n
\nStore in a cool, dry, dark place.
\n
\nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Essential Protect Essential Oil, 1 oz
Short description: Essential Protect Essential Oil, 1 oz \n \nAn immune boosting blend of the essential oils of: \nOrange Peel (Citrus sinensis), Clove Bud (Eugenia caryophyllata), Cinnamon Leaf (Cinnamomum zeylanicum), Rosemary Leaf (Rosmarinus officinalis), Eucalyptus Leaf (Eucalyptus globulus). \n \nAroma: Citrus, spicy, camphoraceous \n \nProperties: Warming, purifying, stimulating \n \nSuggested Use: \nFor aromatherapy. Can be used diluted in a carrier oil for topical use. \n \nTry putting on the bottoms of your feet (diluted) when you are feeling under the weather, or diffuse in an essential oil diffuser when you are wanting to rid your space of germs, bacteria and viruses. A warming, comforting blend of essential oils. \n \nCaution: If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. \nCitrus oils are photosensitive (react to light), so don't apply to skin right before spending time in the sunshine. \n \nYou may also be interested in Bug Shield Essential Oil or Mushroom Immune Powder Capsules. \n \nPlease note that these statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration, and this product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Be sure to consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Testosterone Elite, 30 Capsules
Short description: Testosterone Elite, 30 Capsules \n \nPromotes Free and Total Testosterone \n \nSeeking to maintain healthy testosterone levels? Men need testosterone to build muscle and maintain sexual health, but levels decline over time. Testosterone Elite features a proprietary blend of pomegranate and cacao extracts with luteolin. These nutrients complement each other’s mechanisms of action, supporting testosterone production and encouraging youthful free and total testosterone levels. Testosterone is an essential hormone the body uses to maintain sex drive, bone mass, muscle mass and strength and more. But factors like poor nutrition, age, and stress cause the body to produce less and less of this important hormone. The result? Less testosterone than your body needs. Testosterone Elite combines nutrients that work together to support youthful testosterone production and healthy hormone levels. \n \nThis product is intended to promote testosterone levels but does not contain testosterone. \n \nServing Size: 1 Vegetarian Capsule \n \nAmount Per Serving: \n \nTesnor [std. to ≥ 3.5% punicalagins, ≥ 0.5% theobromine from pomegranate (peel) extract, cacao (Theobroma cacoa) (seed) extract] 400 mg \n \nLuteolin  [from Japanese sophora (flower) extract] 275 mg \n \nOther Ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, stearic acid, silica, rice fiber \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Name: NAD+ Cell Regenerator, 300 mg, 30 Capsules
Short description:
NAD+ Cell Regenerator, 300 mg, 30 Capsules \n \nNAD+ is a cellular coenzyme that’s found in every cell of our bodies. NAD+ is necessary to create adenosine triphosphate (ATP), the compound the body uses for fuel. NAD+ Cell Regenerator™ helps maintain youthful levels of NAD+ with 300 mg of NIAGEN®, the first commercially available form of nicotinamide riboside, to help fight general fatigue at the cellular level. \n
    \n
  • Contains a clinically studied form of nicotinamide riboside to support energy
    • \n
  • Supports healthy levels of the coenzyme NAD+
    • \n
  • NAD+ is used in the production of cellular energy
    • \n

    \n

Name: Eidon Selenium Liquid Concentrate 2 oz
Short description:
Eidon Selenium Liquid Concentrate 2 oz \n

Eidon’s Ionic Liquid Selenium supports a healthy immune system, thyroid and liver function, and breast and prostate tissues. Selenium is involved as a catalyst in several important enzymes. The most well-known function is in the liver where selenium catalyzes or activates the glutathione peroxidase enzyme. This enzyme plays its most significant role in the liver as it cleanses the blood. Without it, the liver could not do its job properly leaving our system full of toxins.

\nSelenium plays an important role in the thyroid where, along with Iodine, it catalyzes the T4 and T3 enzymes which are critical for energy production. Along with the thyroid, Selenium is also found in sizable amounts in healthy breast and prostate tissues. \n \nSelenium is not widespread in the earth’s soils. Consequently, the ability to obtain Selenium in our foods on a regular basis is difficult at best. Supplementation is the best way to insure a steady supply and a steady supply is essential for optimal health. \n

Suggested intake: 30 drops (2ml) daily in water; suitable for children - children under five dosage is 15 drops. Eidon Liquid Minerals are All Natural, Highly Bioavailable and contain NO sugars, starch, artificial flavors, colors, preservatives or animal by-products. Vegan and Gluten-Free.

\nAmount Per Serving (as sodium selenate): 260mcg \n \nOther Ingredients: De-ionized water \n \nYou may also be interested in Eidon Zinc Liquid and the other Eidon Ionic Minerals we carry. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Matcha Tea Powder, Organic, 1 oz. bag
Short description: Matcha Tea Powder, Organic, 1 oz. bag \nCamellia sinensis \n \nMatcha is a powerful form of green tea. It contains nutrients from the entire tea leaf, giving it more caffeine and antioxidants than typically found in green tea. Matcha is also known for its bold green hue and delicious, mildly sweet and nutty flavor. The flavor is particularly vegetal, with some notes of bitterness in addition to the sweetness. This is a healthy tea that will give you consistent, calm energy. It is filled with antioxidants and vitamins. \n \nTo brew: bring water to about 175 degrees, not quite boiling. Use about 1 teaspoon for about ¼ cup of water. Sift the powder into a bowl and add water. Use a bamboo or small kitchen whisk to incorporate into a frothy brew or add sifted powder and water to a mason jar and shake. Matcha is a strong, concentrated cup of tea because the entire leaf is ground into a powder and whisked into a tea. You can dilute with milk for a latte and also add sweetener to taste. \n \nSold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
Description: Matcha Tea Powder, Organic, 1 oz. bag \nCamellia sinensis \n \nMatcha is a powerful form of green tea. It contains nutrients from the entire tea leaf, giving it more caffeine and antioxidants than typically found in green tea. Matcha is also known for its bold green hue and delicious, mildly sweet and nutty flavor. The flavor is particularly vegetal, with some notes of bitterness in addition to the sweetness. This is a healthy tea that will give you consistent, calm energy. It is filled with antioxidants and vitamins. \n \nTo brew: bring water to about 175 degrees, not quite boiling. Use about 1 teaspoon for about ¼ cup of water. Sift the powder into a bowl and add water. Use a bamboo or small kitchen whisk to incorporate into a frothy brew or add sifted powder and water to a mason jar and shake. Matcha is a strong, concentrated cup of tea because the entire leaf is ground into a powder and whisked into a tea. You can dilute with milk for a latte and also add sweetener to taste. \n \nSold in 1oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Enhanced Super Digestive Enzymes, 60 capsules
Short description:
Enhanced Super Digestive Enzymes, 60 capsules \n \nSupports digestion, comfort, and GI balance for plant-based diets. This Best in Class formula contains 10 vegetarian-friendly enzymes plus the probiotic B. coagulans to support GI balance, break down plant-based diets, and digest macros like protein, dairy, starches and fat. Research has shown that supplementing with digestive enzymes can promote optimal digestion and absorption of nutrients from the foods you eat. \n \nNon-GMO \nVegetarian \n \nSupplement Facts \nServing Size 1 Vegetarian Capsule \nAmount Per Serving \n \nVegetarian Digestive Enzyme Blend - 140mg: \nProtease SP (A. oryzae, B. subtilis) 25,000 FCC (HUT) \nBromelain (A. comosus) 800,000 FCC (PU) \nLactase (A. oryzae) 2,000 FCC (ALU) \nCellulase (A. niger) 2,000 FCC (CU) \nLipase (C. rugosa) 2,500 FCC (FIP) \nAlpha Galactosidase (A. niger) 150 (GalU) \nHemicellulase (A. niger) 4,000 (HCU) \nPectinase (A. niger) 25 (endo-PGU) \nProtease 3.0 (A. niger) 10 (SAPU) \nXylanase (T. longibrachiatum) 500 (XU) \n \nLactospore® B. coagulans MTCC5856 - 10 mg \n1 billion CFU (Colony Forming Units at time of manufacture) \n \nOther ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, medium chain triglycerides. \n \nContains wheat, soybeans \n \nDosage and Use: Take one (1) capsule one to two times daily prior to the heaviest meals, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner. \n \nWarning: \n
    \n
  • KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN
    • \n
  • DO NOT EXCEED RECOMMENDED DOSE
    • \n
  • Do not purchase if outer seal is broken or damaged.
    • \n
  • When using nutritional supplements, please consult with your physician if you are undergoing treatment for a medical condition or if you are pregnant or lactating.
    • \n
\nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Ginseng Berry Extract, 2oz.
Short description: Ginseng Berry Extract, 2oz. \n \n100% Pure Wisconsin Grown and fermented American Ginseng (Panax quinquefolius) \n \nWhile American ginseng root extract has long been celebrated for its health benefits, the lesser-known Ginseng Berry Extract is quickly gaining recognition for its unique properties. Derived from the berries of the ginseng plant, this extract offers a concentrated dose of antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds. \n \nNot only does it support overall health and well-being, but it also boasts skin-rejuvenating properties, making it a popular choice for natural beauty enthusiasts. Whether taken internally or applied topically, Ginseng Berry Root Extract is a versatile addition to any wellness routine. \n \nOther ingredients: distilled water, organic cane alcohol \n \nServing Size: 60 drops (2mL) \nServings per container: 30 \n \nRecommendation: with a bitter and sour flavor reminiscent of apple cider vinegar, the ginseng berry is packed with ginsenosides, including 4 not found in the root. Shake well before use. Adults take 60 drops, 1-2 times daily after meals. \n \nPrecautions: \nDo not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. \nDo not use while pregnant or lactating. If you have a medical condition or take medication please consult with your doctor before use. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Psyllium Husk Capsules, 1 oz
Short description: Psyllium Husk Capsules, 1 oz \nPlantago ovata \n \nPsyllium husk is demulcent and helps to provide support for the digestive track. Psyllium is mucilaginous and swells up when introduced to water. The ground or whole husk or capsule must always be taken with at least 1 full glass of water (8oz). \n \nPrecautions \nTake with at least 250 mL (8 oz.) of water. Taking this product without adequate fluid may cause it to swell and block your throat or esophagus and may cause choking. Do not take this product if you have difficulty in swallowing. Other drugs should be taken one hour prior to consumption of psyllium or several hours after consumption, as psyllium may reduce the absorption of certain drugs due to the mucilage content and the increased speed of passage through the intestines. Contraindicated in bowel obstruction, esophageal stenosis, and abnormal intestinal narrowing. \n \nDirections: As a dietary supplement, take 2 capsules daily with meals or water. Store in a cool, dry place. \n \nContents: Organic Psyllium Husk (Plantago ovata). Vegetable Capsule Ingredients: Pullulan, water, carrageenan, and potassium chloride. Product contains no fillers or additives. \n \nSold in 1 oz. quantities. If you want multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. \n1 oz is about 40 capsules. \n \nWe also offer Psyllium Husk Powder in bulk. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Yerba Mate, Organic, 1oz bag
Short description:
This light green beverage hYerba Mate is a traditional South American drink made from the leaves and twigs of the Ilex paraguariensis plant. It’s commonly enjoyed from a gourd using a shared straw, symbolizing friendship and acceptance.as a bold, full-bodied flavor and is typically prepared with just hot water. Our Green Yerba Mate is made from pure leaves, with minimal stems, and is warm air-dried (smoke-free) and aged for at least 9 months to mellow its natural bitterness.
\n
\nYerba Mate is naturally caffeinated and rich in antioxidants, minerals, amino acids, and B vitamins, making it a healthy choice. It offers a smooth, satisfying taste, less acidic than coffee, and contains slightly less caffeine.
\n
\nYou can enjoy Yerba Mate on its own or enhance it with milk, sweeteners, honey, lemon, fruits, or other herbs like mint or lemongrass. It’s versatile and tastes great hot or cold, whether as a latte, smoothie, or refreshing iced tea. Contains caffeine.

Name: DHEA, 100mg Capsules 60ct
Short description:
DHEA, 100mg Capsules 60ct
\nPromotes optimal hormone balance & overall health
\n
\nThe benefits of DHEA supplements include maintaining youthful levels of the hormone, while also encouraging healthy immune function, cardiovascular health, healthy sexual function and more.
\n
\nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
\n
\nThere are a ton of hormones in the human body, but the most abundant ones circulating through our bloodstream is DHEA and this hormone does some excellent stuff for our bodies. It helps us balance other hormones while promoting healthy immune function, circulatory health, healthy sexual function, and more. It even helps us maintain our mood, but levels of this important hormone begin to decline over time.
\n
\nThat's what prompted our experts to scour through the latest research and create our DHEA formula. Gluten-free and non-GMO, our DHEA is available in four different dosages to meet your specific needs.
Description:
DHEA, 100mg Capsules 60ct \nPromotes optimal hormone balance & overall health \n \nThe benefits of DHEA supplements include maintaining youthful levels of the hormone, while also encouraging healthy immune function, cardiovascular health, healthy sexual function and more. \n \nThere are a ton of hormones in the human body, but the most abundant ones circulating through our bloodstream is DHEA and this hormone does some excellent stuff for our bodies. It helps us balance other hormones while promoting healthy immune function, circulatory health, healthy sexual function, and more. It even helps us maintain our mood, but levels of this important hormone begin to decline over time. \n \nThat's what prompted our experts to scour through the latest research and create our DHEA formula. Gluten-free and non-GMO, our DHEA is available in four different dosages to meet your specific needs. \n \nSo start promoting your optimal hormone balance and overall health with DHEA from life extension. You'll be glad you did. \n \nBody composition, mood & more \nIn a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study, 10 months of DHEA supplementation in elderly individuals resulted in increased strength and lean muscle mass from resistance exercise.1 DHEA regimens promote healthy sexual function, support memory and mood, as well as have a beneficial impact on cognition and the brain.2-9 \n
\n \nCardio, circulatory & bone health \nDHEA has beneficial cardiovascular effects.3 It also promotes bone health.10-12 In a randomized, double-blind, controlled trial, one year of DHEA supplementation helped increase bone mineral density in the hips of older adults and spinal bone mineral density in older women.12 \n
\n

Product Details

\n
\n
\n \nZinc stimulates the activity of approximately 300 enzymes. Zinc also promotes immune function, taste sensitivity, protein, DNA and RNA synthesis, healthy insulin response and more.1-2 Age-related declines in immune function are associated with zinc deficiency. Certain aspects of immune function in the elderly have been found to be supported with zinc supplementation.3 \n
\n \nChromium plays an important role in maintaining healthy blood sugar levels in those within normal range when used as part of a healthy diet.4 \n \nBoron is an essential nutrient for supporting optimal calcium metabolism as well as healthy bones and joints.5 Boron intake may also support a healthy prostate. It's been shown to help inhibit oxidative stress and support the body’s normal use of reproductive hormones and vitamin D.6 \n \nVanadyl sulfate is an effective form of the trace mineral vanadium. Research indicates vanadyl sulfate may support insulin response and help maintain already-healthy glucose metabolism.7,8 Research also indicates vanadium salts may help maintain already-healthy blood pressure, thyroid health and iron metabolism.9 \n \nCopper is required by the body to convert iron into a form that can be utilized by hemoglobin, and is an essential constituent of many important enzymes, including superoxide dismutase, a major cellular antioxidant. It’s also needed for normal immune function and synthesis of certain proteins.10 People who consume over 50 mg of zinc daily and/or a high level of fructose are advised to supplement their diet with 2 mg copper several times per week.11,12 \n

\nD-glucarate can be found naturally in many foods. Fruits like grapefruits, apples and oranges, as well as cruciferous vegetables, contain D-glucarate. Calcium D-glucarate is also made in the body. D-glucarate helps support effective and healthy detoxification. \n \nCalcium D-glucarate is the calcium salt of D-glucarate, a compound made in the body through the oxidation of glucose. D-glucarate is also found naturally in grapefruit, apples, oranges and cruciferous vegetables.1,2 D-glucarate can be converted into another compound that helps the body clear steroid hormones and various toxins through a detoxification process called glucuronidation. \n
\n \nThis active D-glucarate metabolite works by inhibiting an enzyme that reverses glucuronidation. By supporting effective detoxification, D-glucarate helps maintain optimal hormone levels and promote clearance.1-3 It also encourages a healthy inflammatory response and offers antioxidant protection.4-6 \n \nCalcium D-glucarate has been shown to support normal cell division in laboratory studies.7-9 In addition, D-glucarate has been found to help maintain already-healthy levels of cholesterol and other lipids.2 \n

Short description: Bee Propolis Resin \n \nOur Honey Bee propolis locally sourced from our beekeeper friend in Waterbury Center, Vermont. \n \nPropolis is a resin produced by bees that is used in the process of building their hives. The word literally means “for the health of the city” and indeed it does keep the beehive clean and protected from bacteria and viruses. It has been found to be a highly useful medicine for fighting infections, boosting the immune system and treating wounds. Propolis is a strong antibacterial, antimicrobial, antifungal, antiviral, and antimicrobial. It is commonly used for sore throats and to stave off illnesses, and can be used topically on cuts, wounds and rashes. It is indicated for bronchitis, pneumonia, and other respiratory infections. Propolis is also used in making salves, tinctures, syrups, and other herbal medicine products. \n \nYou may also be interested in our Propolis Tincture, our herbal Throat Spray or our herbal Drawing Salve. \n \nSold in 1oz quantities. Name: Jiaogulan Capsules 100ct
Short description: Jiaogulan Capsules 100ct \nGynostemma pentaphyllum \n100 veggie capsules \nJiaogulan is a powerful adaptogenic herb sourced from the small farming communities in Northern Thailand. With its sweet taste and numerous health benefits, it’s no wonder that Jiaogulan is often referred to as “The Herb of Immortality”. \n \nJiaogulan contains a class of compounds called gypenosides that are responsible for its impressive health benefits. These compounds are structurally similar to the ginsenosides found in Panax ginseng, which is another plant commonly used in traditional medicine. With over 80 gypenosides identified in Jiaogulan, it has more medicinal saponins than Panax ginseng, and is believed to have a variety of beneficial effects on the body. \n \nResearch suggests that ginsenosides may help improve cardiovascular health, lower blood pressure, reduce the risk of heart disease, and have anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. They have also been studied for their potential to improve cognitive function, enhance immune function, and have anti-cancer effects. \n \nTry Jiaogulan today and experience the numerous benefits for yourself! We also offer Jiaogulan Tincture and Bulk Dried Jiaogulan Tea. \n \nPlease note that these statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration, and this product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Be sure to consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Bone Restore Elite Capsules
Short description:
Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent Vitamin K2
\n120 Veggie Capsules
\n
\nChoose our best-in-class Bone Restore Elite formula for bone health support. It has vitamin K2 as MK-4, clinically studied to support bone density in those that need it most plus calcium, vitamin D3 and trace minerals essential for maintaining strong, healthy bones.
\n
\nBone Restore Elite with Super Potent K2 is a multi-ingredient formula for optimal bone density and mineralization support. It delivers 45 mg (45,000 mcg) of clinically studied vitamin K2 and MK-4, four forms of easily absorbable calcium, vitamin D3 to promote calcium absorption into bone, and zinc, magnesium and other minerals to support and maintain bone health.
\n
\nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.
Description:
Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent Vitamin K2 \n120 Veggie Capsules \n \nChoose our best-in-class Bone Restore Elite formula for bone health support. It has vitamin K2 as MK-4, clinically studied to support bone density in those that need it most plus calcium, vitamin D3 and trace minerals essential for maintaining strong, healthy bones. \n \nBone Restore Elite with Super Potent K2 is a multi-ingredient formula for optimal bone density and mineralization support. It delivers 45 mg (45,000 mcg) of clinically studied vitamin K2 and MK-4, four forms of easily absorbable calcium, vitamin D3 to promote calcium absorption into bone, and zinc, magnesium and other minerals to support and maintain bone health. \n \n  \n \n
\n
\n
\n
\n

Bone Restore Elite with Super Potent K2 Benefits

\n
\n
\n
    \n
  • Supports healthy bone mineral density
    • \n
  • Provides a strong foundation for bone health
    • \n
  • Promotes healthy calcium absorption
    • \n
  • Helps support and maintain overall bone health
    • \n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n

Vitamin K2 and bone density

\nYour body has a built-in process for maintaining healthy bone structure, but this process begins to decline over time. In clinical studies, a special form of vitamin K2 called menaquinone-4 (or just MK-4 for short) has been shown to support the biological processes that help maintain bone mineral density in populations that need it most, such as postmenopausal women. \n
\n

Product Details

\n
\n
\n \nCalcium \n \nBone Restore provides a total of 700 mg of four types of easily absorbed calcium: calcium carbonate, calcium citrate malate, calcium bisglycinate chelate, and calcium fructoborate—all delivered in a capsule designed to facilitate calcium breakdown during digestion. \n
\n \nVitamin D3 \n \nVitamin D is essential for absorbing calcium from the digestive tract into the bloodstream, thus it is vital for helping maintain strong, healthy bones and teeth.1,2 \n \nVitamin K is necessary for healthy bone mineral density \n \nBone loss occurs over time and is a result of an imbalance in the activity of bone cells where there is an increased activity in the bone-dissolving cells called osteoclasts as well as a corresponding decrease in the activity of bone-forming cells, or osteoblasts.3 \n \nVitamin K has been shown to be essential for bone mineralization because it’s a cofactor for the carboxylation of osteocalcin, a protein produced by osteoblasts that is responsible for binding calcium and depositing in the bone. This process is called bone mineralization.4,5 \n \nGetting enough vitamin K2 \n \nIf you’re not getting enough vitamin K2, osteocalcin doesn’t undergo carboxylation and remains in its inactive form, which means it cannot bind to calcium and play its role in bone formation.5 \n \nMagnesium \n \nMagnesium is needed to maintain strong bones and a healthy vascular system.6 Bone Restore contains 300 mg of magnesium from magnesium oxide. \n \nOther bone healthy nutrients \n \nLike other formulas in our Bone Restore family, Bone Restore Elite also delivers healthy doses of the trace minerals your bones need: \n \nZinc, manganese and silicon are essential for healthy bone maintenance. Bone maintenance is the healthy balance between bone mineral resorption and remodeling.7-10 You have to have sufficient intake of these elements to support healthy bone formation. \n \nBoron is a trace mineral with beneficial effects for bone and joint strength.9,11 This formula contains patented Fruitex B® OsteoBoron®, made from a novel calcium/carbohydrate/boron complex. \n \n
\n
\n
\n

Supplement Facts

\n
\n
\n
\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Serving Size 4 capsules
Servings Per Container 30
Amount Per Serving
Vitamin D3 [as cholecalciferol (1000 IU)]25 mcg
Vitamin K2 [as menaquinone-4 (45 mg)]45,000 mcg
Calcium [as carbonate, citrate malate, bisglycinate chelate, fructoborate]700 mg
Magnesium [as magnesium oxide]300 mg
Zinc [as zinc amino acid chelate]2 mg
Manganese [as manganese amino acid chelate]1 mg
Silicon [from horsetail extract (herb), silicon dioxide]]5 mg
Boron [as patented Fruitex B® OsteoBoron® calcium fructoborate]3 mg
Other ingredients: vegetable cellulose (capsule), stearic acid, maltodextrin, ascorbyl palmitate, silica, rice flour, food starch-modified, citric acid.
\n

Fruitex B® and OsteoBoron® are registered trademarks of VDF Futureceuticals, Inc. Pat. Fcpatent.com

\nNon-GMO \n

\n
Dosage and Use
\n
    \n
  • Take four (4) capsules daily, or as recommended by a healthcare practitioner.
    • \n
  • Scientific studies suggest calcium supplementation in divided doses with food in the morning and evening may yield the best results.
    • \n
  • Maintaining an optimal vitamin D blood level also helps maximize calcium absorption.
    • \n
\n
Caution
If you are taking a vitamin K antagonist (e.g. warfarin), consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product.

Name: Mimosa Bark Tincture, 2oz
Short description: Mimosa Bark Tincture, 2oz \nAlbizia julibrissin \n \nThe silk tree, also known as the mimosa tree, is commonly referred to as ‘happiness tree’ in Traditional Chinese Medicine due to its nervine properties and promotion of positive emotional state. The bark can be used in the form of a tea or tincture and can also be powered to make capsules or external pastes. Mimosa is known for its uplifting qualities and can be supportive in times of immense grief, depression, or despair. Consuming the tincture or tea before bed can soothe the nerves to promote a night of sound sleep. Traditionally it has also been used to support someone processing grief or loss and is often combined with Hawthorn for this purpose. Additionally, this bark is used for general skin irritation and can be incorporated in skin care routines in the form of serums, tinctures, and creams. \n \nYou may also be interested in Bulk Silk Tree Bark. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Pu'Erh Tea, Organic, 1oz bag
Short description: Pu'Erh Tea, Organic, 1oz bag \nCamellia sinensis \n \nThis organic pu-erh tea is hand harvested from wild and semi-wild broad leaf antique tea trees located in the Yunnan province of China. Pu-erh is often referred to as "cooked" due to the fact that sun-dried green tea leaves are transformed from a greenish-golden color to a blackish-red tone. Following the sun-drying period it is fermented for 35-60 days, followed by a 7-10 day cooling period. \n \nOver the years pu-erh has garnered a committed following amongst tea connoisseurs who regard it as a sacred relic leftover from ancient tea cultures and traditions. This pu-erh brews up a deep ochre red and has an earthy taste with notes of smoke and moss. It appeals to the senses of both the black tea lover and the green tea lover. \n \nContains caffeine. \n \nSold in 1oz. quantities. If you'd like multiple ounces, just add multiple quantities. \n \nBrew Instructions \nAdd 1 teaspoon of tea to a cloth tea bag or mesh basket and place in your favorite mug. Pour 8 ounces of boiling water over the tea and steep for 3-5 minutes. Experiment with the length of steep time and quantity of tea and find your ideal cup! \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Vitamins D and K 60 capsules
Short description:
Vitamins D and K \n \nThis formula delivers 125 mcg (5,000 IU) of vitamin D3, 2100 mcg of vitamin K and 1000 mcg of iodine in a convenient, once-daily supplement to support bone, brain, thyroid and vascular health. \n
\n \nMaintaining healthy vitamin D levels helps support cognitive health, promotes bone health, encourages healthy immune function and more. Vitamin K helps maintain your body’s calcium balance, which affects everything from cardiovascular health to bone density. Iodine is essential for the production of thyroid hormones. \n \nThese statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing any herbs or supplements into your routine. \n \n
Description:
Vitamins D and K \n \nThis formula delivers 125 mcg (5,000 IU) of vitamin D3, 2100 mcg of vitamin K and 1000 mcg of iodine in a convenient, once-daily supplement to support bone, brain, thyroid and vascular health. \n
\n \nMaintaining healthy vitamin D levels helps support cognitive health, promotes bone health, encourages healthy immune function and more. Vitamin K helps maintain your body’s calcium balance, which affects everything from cardiovascular health to bone density. Iodine is essential for the production of thyroid hormones. \n \n  \n \n
\n
\n

Support your bone, brain, thyroid and arterial health with these three essential nutrients.

\n
\n
\n

Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™ Benefits

\n
\n
\n
    \n
  • Supports healthy cognitive function
    • \n
  • Promotes bone, immune & cardiovascular health
    • \n
  • Helps inhibit calcium buildup in the arteries
    • \n
  • Helps counteract possible iodine deficiency in healthy diets
    • \n
\n

What is iodine?

\n

Iodine is a trace element commonly found in seafood. It facilitates the production of thyroid hormones triiodothyronine (T3) and thyroxine (T4).

\n \n
\nWe’ve combined vitamin D3 with vitamin K and iodine for triple-action health support. Iodine is essential for the production of thyroid hormones. Vitamin K helps maintain your body’s calcium balance. Vitamin D supports cognitive health, healthy bone density, immune health and more. Get all of these vital nutrients in a convenient, once-daily supplement. \n
\n

Product Details

\n
\n
\n \nYour skin produces vitamin D when in direct sunlight, but you should not get your vitamin D from unprotected sun exposure or indoor tanning devices because of the potential effects on skin health. \n
\n \nIodine is a trace element essential for the production of thyroid hormones, and vitamin K is an essential nutrient that promotes both arterial and bone health. \n \nIodine is essential for thyroid health \n \nIodine is a trace element necessary for the production of the thyroid hormones triiodothyronine (T3) and thyroxine (T4).1 Iodine is abundant in seafood and sea vegetables, but not everyone likes or has access to marine foods, and vegan diets sometimes lack adequate iodine.2 \n \nCommercial salt makers add iodine to table salt to make up for this potential deficiency. However, we now know the health risks of eating too much salt, so health-conscious people may miss out on an easy source of iodine. Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™ delivers 1,000 mcg of iodine to support healthy iodine levels. \n \nVitamin K1 and two different types of K2 \n \nVitamin K helps inhibit calcium buildup in your arteries while promoting healthy calcium absorption into your bone matrix.3 K1 is the most common form of vitamin K in the diet, coming primarily from leafy green vegetables—though vitamin K1 isn’t well absorbed from these foods. \n \nVitamin K2 is found in cheese, eggs and fermented soybeans. It has been shown to be more bioavailable than K1 and to remain active in the body far longer. The MK-4 and MK-7 forms of vitamin K2 also provide important benefits but have different tissue distributions and bioavailability, so it’s important to take both.4,5 This formula contains both forms of vitamin K2. \n \nVitamin D3 for cognitive, bone and immune health \n \nHealthy serum vitamin D levels have been shown to correspond with better cognitive function.6,7 Vitamin D, along with vitamin K and essential minerals, is necessary for facilitating the transport of calcium into the bone matrix for strong, healthy bones and teeth.8 Vitamin D also plays a critical role in healthy immune function.9 \n \nSome people may need 125 mcg (5,000 IU) to 200 mcg (8,000 IU) of vitamin D3 a day to achieve healthy blood levels of vitamin D. If your multivitamin already delivers 25-75 mcg (1,000–3,000 IU) of vitamin D, adding Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™ may help achieve healthy vitamin D levels. \n \nVitamin D3 for heart health and blood pressure support \n \nVitamin D promotes a healthy inflammatory response, supports cardiovascular health and encourages healthy endothelial function. Vitamin D also helps inhibit excess renin levels. Healthy renin levels help maintain healthy blood pressure already within the normal range.10 \n \nGetting enough vitamins D and K and iodine \n \nThis vitamin D3 supplement delivers 125 mcg (5,000 IU) of vitamin D3 as cholecalciferol per capsule. We suggest that you take a 25-hydroxy vitamin D blood test after 3 months to assess and adjust your dosage. Your optimal blood levels should be 50–80 ng/ml year-round. \n \nEnsure you get enough of these three essential nutrients with Vitamins D and K with Sea-Iodine™. \n
\n

Supplement Facts

\n
\n
\n
\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n

Iodine [from Sea-Iodine™ Complex Blend (organic kelp and bladderwrack extracts, potassium iodide)]1000 mcg
Other ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose (capsule), maltodextrin, food starch-modified, dicalcium phosphate, stearic acid, silica.
\nNon-GMO \n \n 
Dosage and Use
\n
    \n
  • Take one (1) capsule once daily with food, or as recomended by a healthcare practitioner.
    • \n
\n
Caution
Individuals consuming more than 50 mcg (2,000 IU)/day of vitamin D (from diet and supplements) should periodically obtain a serum 25-hydroxy vitamin D measurement. Do not exceed 250 mcg per day unless recommended by your doctor. Vitamin D supplementation is not recommended for individuals with high blood calcium levels. If you have a thyroid condition or are taking antithyroid medications, do not use without consulting your healthcare practitioner. If you are taking a vitamin K antagonist (e.g. warfarin), consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product.

Name: Dreams & Visions Tincture 2oz
Short description: A blend of mugwort, blue lotus, damiana, lavender, and blue vervain for restful sleep and vivid dreams. Small-batch crafted with organic cane alcohol.
Description:
The Dreams & Visions Tincture 2oz by Rogue Herbalist is a carefully crafted blend of five revered dream-enhancing herbs: mugwort, blue lotus, damiana, lavender, and blue vervain. Each plant in this formula has a long history in traditional herbalism for supporting restful sleep, enhancing dream clarity, and inviting a deeper connection to the dream world.

\n

Mugwort is perhaps the most well-known dream herb, traditionally used to encourage vivid and sometimes lucid dreams. Blue lotus, prized by ancient cultures, is said to promote relaxation and a sense of gentle euphoria, making it a perfect evening ally. Damiana offers a soothing yet uplifting quality, helping to ease tension before bed. Lavender’s calming aroma and properties have been used for centuries to quiet the mind, while blue vervain supports the release of daily stress, setting the stage for restorative rest.

\n

This formula is extracted in 47.5% organic cane alcohol to ensure potency and stability, blended with ROM maple water and organic glycerine for a smooth and balanced taste. Every batch is made in small quantities to maintain freshness and quality.

\n

To enjoy, take 30 drops (1ml) in a small amount of water or directly under the tongue about an hour before bed. Many find this tincture especially useful for dream journaling practices, meditation before sleep, or simply enhancing the quality of rest.

\n

For a broader nighttime wellness approach, consider pairing the Dreams & Visions Tincture with our Sleep Formula Tincture for deep relaxation. If mental clarity upon waking is important, explore our Lion’s Mane Mushroom Extract or Brain Mushroom Support for daytime cognitive support.

\n

Let the Dreams & Visions Tincture 2oz guide you toward restful nights and memorable dreams.

Name: Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula Capsules
Short description: Gentle, herbal support for healthy bowel movements and digestive regularity. A classic formula by Dr. Christopher for lower bowel function.
Description:
Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula gently supports healthy digestion and regular bowel movements. This herbal blend combines cascara sagrada bark, barberry root, ginger, lobelia, and other traditional herbs. Together, they provide natural cleansing and digestive support.

\n

For centuries, people have used cascara sagrada as a mild laxative. It stimulates the colon and encourages regularity without harsh cramping or dependency. In addition, barberry and ginger soothe the digestive tract and promote healthy digestion. Lobelia helps relax smooth muscles gently. Therefore, these herbs work together to encourage natural elimination and digestive comfort.

\n

This formula suits those with occasional constipation or sluggish digestion. Unlike harsh stimulant laxatives, Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula works in harmony with the body. You can use it short-term for relief or as part of a regular wellness routine to maintain gut health.

\n

Dr. John R. Christopher created this formula to honor the body’s natural rhythms. He aimed to support long-term digestive wellness. Each batch retains the potency and purity of these time-tested herbs.

\n

Suggested Use: Take two capsules daily with water. Preferably, take before bedtime or follow your healthcare professional’s advice. Avoid use during pregnancy or if allergic to any ingredient.

\n

In summary, Christopher’s Lower Bowel Formula helps maintain digestive balance. It promotes gentle and natural elimination.

\n

If you're looking for other amazing digestive products, check out our Hemp Bitters, Digestive Bitters, and our Heal The Gut tea blend.

Name: Digestive Bitters Formula - 2 oz
Short description: A traditional herbal formula designed to stimulate digestive secretions and support healthy digestion. Made with organic bitters including gentian, dandelion, and citrus peel.
Description:
Activate your digestion with this traditional digestive bitters formula made from a potent blend of roots, seeds, leaves, and citrus peels. Bitters have long been used to support healthy digestion by stimulating stomach acid, bile, and digestive enzyme production—essential for breaking down food and absorbing nutrients.

\n

This handcrafted Digestive Bitters Formula includes gentian, artichoke leaf, dandelion, fennel, ginger, and other time-tested herbs that help prepare the body for meals. Whether you're dealing with sluggish digestion, occasional bloating, or simply want to support long-term gut health, Digestive Bitters can make a powerful difference.

\n

Take Digestive Bitters before meals to:

\n \n
    \n
  • \n

    Stimulate digestive secretions

    \n
    • \n
  • \n

    Support liver and gallbladder function

    \n
    • \n
  • \n

    Reduce occasional gas and bloating

    \n
    • \n
  • \n

    Promote better nutrient absorption

    \n
    • \n
  • \n

    Encourage a mindful eating ritual

    \n
    • \n
\n

In addition to digestive benefits, many of the herbs in this blend—such as yellowdock, dandelion, and oregon grape root—have traditionally been used to support liver detoxification, healthy blood function, and balanced blood sugar levels. By promoting bile flow and supporting the liver’s natural cleansing role, bitters can help your body eliminate metabolic waste more effectively. Some bitter herbs also assist with regulating post-meal blood sugar spikes, making this a helpful formula for overall metabolic health.

\n

Digestive Bitters Formula are extracted using organic cane alcohol and ROM distilled maple water to preserve the full spectrum of active plant compounds.

\n \n \n
\n

Digestive Bitters Formula Ingredients:
Angelica Root, Artichoke Leaf, Gentian Root, Dandelion Root, Dandelion Leaf, Grapefruit Peel, Orange Peel, Lemon Peel, Oregon Grape Root, Fennel Seed, Anise Seed, Ginger, Yellowdock.
Other Ingredients: Organic Cane Alcohol (47.5%)

\n \n \n
\n

Suggested Use:
Take 30 drops (about 1 dropperful) in 1 oz of water, 10–15 minutes before meals. Digestive Bitters work best when tasted—embrace the flavor!

\n \n \n
\n

Not for use during pregnancy. Consult your healthcare provider before use if nursing or taking medications. Not intended for children.

Name: Buhner’s Blessings – Tick-Borne Support Protocol (4 oz Tincture)
Short description: A foundational herbal formula inspired by Stephen Harrod Buhner’s protocol, featuring five powerful herbs to support immune function and microbial balance during tick-borne challenges.
Description:
Buhner’s Blessings – Tick-Borne Support Protocol (4 oz Tincture)

\n

This formula is a foundational herbal protocol designed to support individuals dealing with the complex terrain of tick-borne challenges, including exposure to Borrelia species. Inspired by the renowned work of clinical herbalist Stephen Harrod Buhner, this blend features five well-regarded herbs traditionally used to promote immune resilience, support systemic health, and maintain balance in the face of microbial stress.

\n

At the heart of this formula is Andrographis paniculata, known for its wide-reaching immune-modulating effects. Japanese Knotweed Root provides cardiovascular, neurological, and cytokine pathway support, while Cat’s Claw Bark helps promote healthy immune surveillance. Houttuynia cordata, a lesser-known but powerful plant ally, supports microbial balance and mucosal health. Sarsaparilla Root rounds out the blend, traditionally used to assist detoxification and inflammatory regulation.

\n

Each 1 mL serving delivers a potent 1:2 extract in organic cane alcohol and reverse osmosis maple water

\n \n \n
\n

Ingredients (per serving):

Name: Gentian Root Tincture - 2 oz
Short description: A pure bitter, Gentian root is used for stimulating digestion and awakening appetite. Made with Organic Gentian Root.
Description:
Get your digestion moving naturally with our Gentian Root Tincture – 2 oz. Gentian (Gentiana lutea) is one of the most well-known “pure bitters,” prized for centuries as a digestive aid. This classic bitter root is famous for its role in Angostura Bitters and other traditional cocktail recipes, but its true power lies in herbal wellness.

\n

Gentian Root is considered a true digestive bitter, helping stimulate the body’s natural digestive secretions. Traditionally, it has been used to support sluggish liver function, encourage appetite, and ease common digestive discomforts. Many herbalists recommend gentian for symptoms such as gas, bloating, cramping, nausea, vomiting, and occasional heartburn. Its stimulating, cooling qualities also make it valuable in cases of sluggish digestion or when food feels heavy after meals.

\n

In herbal traditions, Gentian Root is classified as a hepatic, cholagogue, choleretic, emmenagogue, mild sialogogue, febrifuge, anthelmintic, antimicrobial, and hypoglycemic. This wide spectrum of actions highlights its versatility as a tonic herb, especially for those seeking to strengthen overall digestive and liver health. Some traditions also note gentian’s usefulness in easing allergy symptoms due to its influence on gut-liver balance.

\n

Our Gentian Root Tincture is made with organically grown dried gentian roots, carefully extracted in 47.5% organic cane alcohol and blended with ROM maple water for a clean and effective formula. We take pride in small-batch craftsmanship to ensure potency and purity.

\n

Gentian is also a key ingredient in our Digestive Bitters Formula, an excellent companion if you’re seeking a complete bitters blend.

\n

Ingredients: Organically Grown Dried Gentian Roots, 47.5% Organic Cane Alcohol, ROM Maple Water.

\n

Do not use gentian during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

\n

Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Always consult your herbalist or healthcare provider before introducing new herbs or supplements into your routine.

Name: Rock Rose Loose Herb – Cistus incanus – 4 oz
Short description: Rock rose (Cistus incanus) loose herb tea supports immune health, disrupts biofilms, and may help with various infections including tick infections and co-infections.
Description:
Rock rose (Cistus incanus) is a remarkable Mediterranean herb valued for centuries in herbal traditions. This loose herb is ideal for brewing a fragrant, earthy tea with a wide range of potential benefits.

\n

One of the most notable qualities of Rock rose Cistus incanus is its potential role in supporting the body during various infections. It has been suggested to offer benefits against viral, bacterial, and fungal challenges. Many practitioners consider it an “intelligent” biofilm buster, disrupting the protective barriers that bacteria use to evade conventional antibiotics. This property makes it of special interest in protocols addressing persistent infections.

\n

Dr. Dietrich Klinghardt has highlighted the use of Rock rose Cistus incanus tea in his Biological Lyme Protocol, noting its potential effectiveness against Borrelia burgdorferi (the Lyme disease pathogen) and co-infections such as Bartonella. Studies have also explored its antiviral effects, showing activity against influenza, rhinoviruses, HIV, Ebola, and Marburg viruses, possibly by preventing viruses from attaching to host cells.

\n

Research also indicates antibacterial potential, especially against Gram-positive bacteria like Streptococcus mutans, helping reduce bacterial adhesion in the mouth and supporting oral health. Its antioxidant potential is exceptionally high, potentially exceeding that of green tea and red wine, contributing to immune support and healthy inflammatory balance.

\n

Additionally, the polyphenols in Rock rose Cistus incanus may help bind heavy metals, assisting the body’s detoxification processes. This makes it a valuable part of a seasonal wellness routine.

\n

To prepare, steep 1–2 teaspoons of the loose herb in freshly boiled water for 10–15 minutes. Enjoy warm, up to three times daily, or as recommended by your practitioner.

\n

You may also enjoy pairing Rock rose Cistus incanus with Olive Leaf Extract, Elderberry Syrup, or Buhner's Blessings Tick Borne Infection Support for a more complete immune-supporting protocol.

Name: Ultimate Methylene Blue 2oz by Earth Harmony
Short description: Ultimate Methylene Blue 2oz by Earth Harmony delivers 10mg of 99.9% USP Grade methylene blue per serving, blended with nano gold, ORMUS minerals, structured water, and organic glycerin.
Description:
Ultimate Methylene Blue 2oz by Earth Harmony

\n

This is a premium liquid supplement. It is created for those seeking advanced support for balance, energy, and overall vitality. Crafted with precision, this formula brings together the highest quality Methylene Blue USP Grade (99.9%). Additionally, it includes nano liquid gold, ORMUS supercharged minerals, organic vegetable glycerin, and triple distilled biophotonic structured water.

\n

Methylene blue is a long-established compound. It was first synthesized in the 19th century and historically used as a dye and in treating malaria. Today, it holds FDA-approval for treating methemoglobinemia. This is a rare condition where red blood cells struggle to release oxygen effectively.

\n

Beyond this, early research—particularly in animal studies and small human trials—suggests that low-dose methylene blue may support mitochondrial function. It does this by enhancing cellular energy (ATP) production and reducing oxidative stress. It is also being explored for its potential neuroprotective and cognitive-supportive properties. These applications are in conditions like Alzheimer’s.

\n

However, experts caution that current evidence remains limited. Combining methylene blue with certain medications—especially antidepressants—can pose significant risks, including serotonin syndrome.

\n

Each serving of 1ml (20 drops) contains 10mg of pure methylene blue. This is measured for consistency and purity. This ingredient has been widely studied in scientific research and is now gaining renewed interest in modern wellness communities. By combining methylene blue with nano liquid gold and ORMUS minerals, Earth Harmony has created a synergistic blend. It reflects both advanced science and traditional mineral practices.

\n

The liquid base is made with triple distilled, biophotonic structured water, ensuring clarity and energetic stability. Organic vegetable glycerin provides smooth taste, easy dosing, and efficient absorption, while keeping the formula clean and formaldehyde-free.

\n

As with all concentrated formulas, we recommend discussing use with your healthcare provider. Do not use if you are currently taking psychiatric medications, including treatments for anxiety, depression, or serotonin modulation. Responsible and informed use is key to getting the most out of this product.
